Nemesis Enforcer/Beachcomber/Smokescreen/Oblitertron:



Nemesis Enforcer saw those two Newcomer assassins attacking his leader, 
taking out his missile launcher, his rifle in one hand, the launcher in the 
other, he took aim.  Firing twenty rapid laser blasts off at the engine of 
the mercenaries' skimmer, a rocket off at the skimmer.

---

Beachcomber saw Zardus under attack, as did Smokescreen.

"We had better show our good faith." Beachcomber suggested.

"Yeah." Smokescreen raised his electro-distruptor rifle, firing off four 
blasts off at the engines of the skimmer.

Beachcomber fired three laser bolts off at the "cockpit" (or control station) 
of the skimmer.

---

Oblitertron had been looking around a lot.  Though Pyro was in control, the 
other minds were urging to get out of there as more and more bots began to 
pull out stronger weapons and start to get a little angry at the gestalt 
attacking their higher-ups.  About to disassemble, Oblitertron saw the 
mercenaries working for the Newcomers attack his leader, Zardus.  Yelling, 
Oblitertron turned his weight towards the mercenaries' skimmer, firing an 
optic blast as he raised a palm, firing a missile off at the same skimmer.
